meanings.definition: A small ring or circle used as a decorative element in architecture or heraldry.
meanings.sent1: The ancient building had intricate annulets adorning its columns.
meanings.sent2: She wore a necklace with delicate annulets that sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous child pretended the annulets on the wall were secret portals.
meanings.sent4: The annulets of history encircled the castle, telling tales of the past.
meanings.sent5: The golden annulets gleamed like tiny suns against the dark stone.

meanings.definition: A small circular band worn as jewelry.
meanings.sent1: Her favorite bracelet was a set of silver annulets linked together.
meanings.sent2: The princess adorned her wrists with elegant annulets for the royal ball.
meanings.sent3: He jokingly claimed the annulets on his fingers were magical charms.
meanings.sent4: The annulets on her ears jingled softly with each step she took.
meanings.sent5: The jeweler crafted intricate annulets that caught the eye of all who passed by.

meanings.definition: A small circular mark or spot.
meanings.sent1: The map was covered in tiny annulets indicating important locations.
meanings.sent2: She noticed a series of red annulets on the document highlighting key details.
meanings.sent3: The artist added colorful annulets to the painting for a playful touch.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes focused on the lone annulet amidst a sea of words on the page.
meanings.sent5: The detective circled the suspicious annulet in the photograph as a clue.
